document_data.name: Halana Shauluth
document_data.mainbody: '''Halana Shauluth''' was a baker in the village of [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] around 1370 DR.
document_data.Activities: She baked hard loaves of wheat and meat-filled buns.
document_data.History:
Halana was formerly a mercenary who was in a group with a dozen female [[dwarf|dwarves]], but she lost her hand after it became infected with gangrene, She then retired from that career to become a baker.

She claimed to have seen the "Ghost of Amphail", the [[ghost]] of [[Amphail the Just]] (after whom the village was named) and that the ghost rescued her from thieves who were trying to rob her.
